user_prompt: As a bank customer, I require a modern, user-friendly self-service portal that allows me to efficiently manage my banking needs without visiting physical branches. I need to securely log in using multi-factor authentication and access a personalized dashboard displaying available banking products and services based on my profile and eligibility. The portal must enable me to submit account opening requests and service modifications through streamlined workflows requiring minimal clicks. I expect to receive real-time status updates and email notifications regarding my submitted requests. The system should maintain a comprehensive history of all my interactions while ensuring my sensitive financial data remains secure. The portal must be responsive across various devices, providing a consistent experience whether I access it via desktop, tablet, or mobile phone. I should be able to save incomplete applications and return to them later, with the ability to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface. The solution must integrate seamlessly with the bank's existing core banking system while maintaining its own database to ensure optimal performance and reliability. Role-based access controls must be implemented to ensure I can only view and access services appropriate to my profile and authorization level.

epics.title: User Authentication and Access Management
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication with multi-factor authentication and role-based access control.
epics.description: Develop and integrate a robust user authentication mechanism that enables customers to securely log in using credentials and multi-factor authentication. Implement role-based access control to ensure users only access services relevant to their profile and authorization level. The authentication system should integrate seamlessly with the bank's identity management system, maintaining compliance with security standards and privacy regulations.

epics.title: Responsive User Interface and Dashboard
epics.summary: Design and build a responsive, user-friendly interface and personalized dashboard.
epics.description: Create an intuitive and responsive user interface that provides a consistent experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Develop a personalized dashboard displaying banking products and services based on user profile and eligibility. The dashboard should prioritize usability and quick access to core functions, ensuring a seamless and engaging experience.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the existing core banking system.
epics.description: Implement a reliable integration layer that connects the self-service portal with the bank's core banking systems. Ensure real-time synchronization of data related to account information, customer details, and service requests. The integration must be secure, efficient, and adhere to system architecture best practices to maintain performance and data consistency.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Enable customers to request new accounts or modify existing services through streamlined workflows.
epics.description: Design and implement guided, user-friendly workflows for customers to open new accounts or request modifications to existing services. Minimize the number of steps required to complete each request while maintaining data validation and compliance checks. Include options for saving and resuming incomplete applications and uploading required documents securely through the portal interface.

epics.title: Notification and Status Tracking System
epics.summary: Provide real-time updates and notifications regarding user requests and interactions.
epics.description: Develop a system to deliver real-time status updates and email notifications for all submitted service requests and applications. Integrate this functionality into the dashboard, allowing users to track progress at any stage. Notifications should include event-based triggers such as submission confirmations, approval statuses, or document requests.

epics.title: Interaction History and Audit Management
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive record of all customer interactions and requests.
epics.description: Establish a system that logs every customer interaction within the portal, including account openings, modifications, document uploads, and communications. Ensure that these records are securely stored and accessible to authorized users for audit and compliance purposes. Implement mechanisms for efficient data retrieval and reporting while adhering to data retention and privacy policies.

epics.title: Security and Data Protection Framework
epics.summary: Implement advanced security measures and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.
epics.description: Develop and enforce a robust security framework that includes encryption for sensitive data, session management, and regular vulnerability assessments. Ensure all interactions and data exchanges are protected with industry-standard protocols. Maintain compliance with regulatory standards such as GDPR and PCI DSS, and conduct periodic audits to validate adherence.

epics.title: Performance Optimization and Reliability Enhancement
epics.summary: Optimize the portalâ€™s performance and ensure high availability.
epics.description: Implement performance tuning strategies for the self-service portal and its database to handle concurrent usage efficiently. Introduce caching mechanisms and load balancing to ensure consistent performance. Set up monitoring and alerting systems to detect anomalies, minimize downtime, and maintain reliability. Ensure scalability to support growing customer bases and transaction volumes.
